data.title: Does the Gilan province of Iran Turkify gradually?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 6): That is true. Historically the Guilan province was heavily Turkified during the Safavid period. They were a religious dynasty that were influenced by the teachings of several Sufi groups. Actually Ismail I who also spoke Azerbaijani was sent to Guilan province as it was the birth...
